name: Winter Snow Giant Truck Drive
description: Cars coverred with heavy snow due to excessive amount of snowfall in offroad cold area. Snowfalling & falling glaciers enhances the beauty of woodland in winter season with shine reflection of sunlight. Amazing and Beautiful landscapes will force you to play the full game till end and complete all the challenging missions with 4x4 pickup truck and 8x8 gigantic transporter truck containing trailer carrying snowman, trunks and other imported sports cars. Do not let the luggage or tree trunks drop on the way although it is difficult to drive and transport in snow weather & slipery roads. Prove yourself worthy of skillful hill driver for this extreme mountain truck driving. In this ultimate mountain truck driving game, with heavy construction and with the slipery after snowfall, in pickup, luggage or trunks are not safe without a gigantic driver.
